entities.name: karkaroff
entities.description: Karkaroff is mentioned as someone who is genuinely worried about something. He is going to Snape for answers.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who is being sought out by Karkaroff and others for answers. Dumbledore trusts him.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as someone who trusts Snape. He would not let Snape teach at Hogwarts if he had ever worked for Voldemort.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as someone that Snape would never work for.

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as someone who takes his Defense Against the Dark Arts seriously and does not trust anyone.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: Crouch is mentioned as someone who is keen to get into Snape's office.

relationships.description: Karkaroff is seeking answers from Snape.
Moody and Crouch are working together to get into Snape's office.
